Lazy Linen White 100% Washed Linen Fitted Sheet Our beautifully soft Lazy Linen is perfect for that laid back, effortless look and the secret to a wonderful night’s sleep. 100% washed linen available in 6 gorgeous colours with a casual appearance which improves with age. With enhanced breathability making it fresh and cool in summer and cosy in winter. Ironing is only optional. Linen has much lower environmental impact than normal cotton. The flax plant which it is made from, is much less water intensive than the cotton plant and requires very little if any artificial fertilisers or insecticides, it is naturally insect repellent. The plant bi-products like seeds and oils are also used in food production processes so there is very little waste. With our Lazy Linen we carry on this important sustainable message by having zero plastic packaging. Instead we supply the bed linen product in a useful self-fabric linen bag with draw strings which once opened can be used again and again for storing small items.Machine washable. 100% Linen.

Prada Paradoxe Intense Eau de Parfum 30ml This feminine fragrance explores strength through the lens of delicacy. The result is the intense signature of a woman in perpetual self-reinvention, challenging conventions to explore a femininity that is both powerful and delicate. A floral ambery fragrance with a woody inflexion that reveals the paradoxical intensity of delicate ingredients: the powerful lift of a delicate Jasmine flower and the vibrant and enveloping warmth of an Amber accord, intensified by a subtle yet instantly recognizable Moss accord. An intense scent for a powerfully enigmatic and captivating expression of femininity. The intensification of florality with the Jasmine superinfusion, for an exceptional aura. The intensification of sensuality with AmbrofixTM made even more vibrant. The intensification of a captivating woody addiction with a bold and powerful Moss accord. Like the original signature, Paradoxe Intense’s renewed bottle is an expression of the Fashion House’s essence of reinvention and predilection for contrasts. In a shift from traditional perfume bottle architecture, the flacon is minimal and delicate at first glance, inspired by the original iconic Prada triangle logo disruptively designed to rest on its side. The Prada coat of arms logo contrasts with the deep pink colour the fragrance. Paradoxe is a fragrance built on three ingredients including Moroccan Neroli Oil, Vanilla Infusion and Calabrian Bergamot Heart. The multi-step bioconversion process behind Ambrofix™ allows amber to be naturally derived from sugar cane rather than sage. Serenolide™ is a new musk molecule that is one of our most diffusive in existence created for this fragrance. Prada Paradoxe boxes are FSC™ MIX certified. The entire Prada Paradoxe range is refillable, allowing for less packaging material. A single 50ml bottle of Prada Paradoxe and a 100ml refill helps avoid the use of 40% less materials in total as opposed to three 50ml bottles of Prada Paradoxe. This includes 29% less glass. The entire Prada Paradoxe range is refillable, allowing for less packaging material. Olaplex No. 0 Intensive Bond Building Hair Treatment 150ml Our professional-inspired treatment primes your hair for deeper repair, rebuilds hair bonds, strengthens, and protects hair integrity. Use as the first step in a two-part system with No.3 Hair Perfector (sold separately) to strengthen and repair all types of damaged hair. Apply slowly to dry hair, distributing evenly from root to tip. Work No. 0 into small sections by squeezing the liquid into the hair to be fully absorbed as you go. Lightly saturate from root to tip. Nike White MC Training Trainers The Nike MC trainer two can help you shift from circuit training in the weight room to the field turf for quick-twitch conditioning, seamlessly. Stable Strength: The flat base is wider around the heel to help stabilise your foot while you work with weights. Thick and thin traction: Rubber tread gives you traction from the turf to the training room floor. Havaianas Top Sandals Havaianas Top flip-flop is our most classic model, based on Japanese Zori sandals. The original model created in 1962 was the Traditional Top in white and blue. The birth of the Top came when people decided to turn the sole over and turn this model into a black and white flip-flop. Given the success of this converted model, Havaianas would create the first solid-colour flip-flop in green in 1996. Today you can choose from a wide range of colours, from pastel to neutral tones and brighter colours. With their soft rubber upper and non-slip sole, these flip-flops will keep you comfortable all day long. They are also available in a wide variety of colours and patterns so you can find the perfect pair for you. They are ideal for use at the beach, in the pool or any casual occasion. 40% of the sole of these flip-flops is made from waste rubber from the Havaianas production process. There are no harmful substances in these flip-flops, ensuring customer safety and environmental protection. Cool on the outside and responsible on the inside, that's how we like it. 100% of the waste from the straps of these flip-flops is reintegrated into our manufacturing process. With Havaianas Top, you will have a comfortable and stylish shoe that will adapt to any outfit. Get them today and feel the difference in every step! Versace Pour Femme Dylan Turquoise Eau De Toilette 30ml Escape to faraway islands where the blue sky meets crystal waters and the sea breeze caresses the skin, waking up the senses and regenerating the soul. A fragrance to remind us of warm sun and summer days, Versace Pour Femme Dylan Turquoise eau de toilette is an ode to the sensuality of the Versace woman. The elegant curves of the bottle are reminiscent of an amphora, strongly evoking the Greek culture and mythology already found in the Versace Home collections. The frosted glass is coloured in hues of blue to reflect the crystal-clear waters of the sea and denote a constant desire for summer. Created by perfumer Sophie Labbé, the fragrance itself embodies both tradition and innovation, having been created with natural and synthetic ingredients of the finest quality, obtained from traceable and sustainable supply chains throughout the world. It meets the highest standards in terms of environmental and social sustainability, in line with the principles of green chemistry and benefiting from the latest research in biotechnology. Over 85% of the raw ingredients used in the fragrance are biodegradable. At the top, a burst of light with Primofiore lemon leading the dance, giving a slightly acidic but constant green note. Picked in the very early days of the season, this first winter fruit offers an amazing amount of juice, creating a wonderfully energetic air. The lemon is accompanied by Sicilian mandarin, combining odour molecules from the peel and flesh of the fruit to offer a multi-faceted note. Even more exuberance is added by pink peppercorn, smelling very similar to red berries. The heart notes are what give the fragrance its creativity, with a special accord enhancing the freshness of guava juice for an enduring, exotic and tropical undertone. For a fresh and airy feel, the guava is complemented by transparent jasmine petals with a floral profile enhanced with the essence of freesia, turning the composition into a modern green. The base notes fall between light and shade, where Clearwood lends a modernity to the fragrance, combining an amber sensuality with a woody character but leaving no trace of the earthy and camphor notes typical of these essences. Made from sugarcane, this original molecule is the first to be created by biotechnology. Combined with a cocktail of vibrant woods and white musk, it rounds out this prestigious and luminous Floral-Woody-Musk eau de toilette.

The powerful fragrance is distinguished by its incense notes, which bring an incandescent intensity to the emblematic marine notes of Acqua di Giò. The result is a charismatic, vibrant fragrance with an aura of mystery, that is representative of a rugged landscape meeting the ocean’s strength and immensity. A new preciousness is evoked in the bottle’s design, with the flacon’s sleek, masculine form crafted in tones of graduated black. The Acqua di Giò Parfum bottle is refillable, with some of its ingredients being natural and sustainably sourced . Acqua di Giò Parfum, the powerfully addictive scent. INSTRUCTIONS OF USE: Using your favourite blush brush, gently swirl the brush into the pan coating the bristles. Lightly tap off the excess and apply to the cheeks in sweeping or circular motions. Signature blushing looks from Armani artistry pros: Kissed By The Sun: Gently coat the tip of your blush brush with the powder and sweep across the cheeks starting at the outside of the face. Apply a light dusting on the high points of the face including the bridge of the nose, top of the forehead and chin for an all-over sun kissed complexion. Naturally Flushed: Using the wider/flatter end of brush, lightly pat colour onto the centre apples of cheeks using swift circular motions – for a more precise pop of colour, use a smaller brush for added control.

Multi faceted like a diamond, sensual and enticing, daring yet reassuring. Versace Crystal Noir is a magical fragrance - ethereal yet carnal, an ultra feminine Floral Oriental scent. Its olfactory pyramid is deliberately minimalist in order to enhance the intrinsic elegance of the ingredients. Top notes of cardamom, pepper, ginger give way to a heart of fresh, crisp, fragrant gardenia alongside peony and orange flowers. This has been blended with base notes of sandalwood, musks and amber that is purified almost to transparency for a sensuous and seductive result. It is a combination that creates a wonderful contradiction, like the two sides of every woman: sweet and sensual, earthy and sophisticated.

Obaby Grey Nika 3 Piece Furniture The Obaby Nika range offers a contemporary design, due to its clean lines and textured oak effect finish, that will fit perfectly in today s modern nursery. This three-piece room set consists of Nika cot bed, changing unit and double wardrobe. The Nika cot bed has three mattress base positions, the highest allowing you to put down and pick up your newborn without straining your back through unnecessary bending. As your little one starts to develop and become more active, the mattress base can then be lowered by a further two positions keeping them safe and secure at all times while the teething rails protect their delicate first teeth. When your little one is standing confidently, the Nika can be easily transformed into a stylish toddler bed that still offers the familiarity they are used to and helps them to transition in an often-daunting time. Once transformed the toddler bed can be used until they are approximately four years old. Requires an Obaby 140 x 70cm mattress. The Nika changing unit is a piece of furniture that can be used for years to come. Three large 32L capacity, full-depth drawers offer plenty of space for changing essentials, toys and your little one s precious possessions. All three drawers feature two brushed metal handles and glide on smooth runners allowing you to easily open them with either hand. Discreet spring pins allow the changing area to be attached to the top of the unit without any unsightly screws showing, it perfectly accommodates a changing mat up to 76 x 46 cm and is set at a comfortable height for parents. When the changing area is no longer needed the frame can be easily removed to create a solid top chest of drawers. Completing the set is the Nika double wardrobe, featuring one large cupboard space, with two sturdy hanging rails for all of your little one s special outfits, fronted by a pair of soft close doors. Underneath the main cupboard, the area is a single 33L capacity, full-depth drawer providing the perfect storage solution for those items that cannot be hung up. Stylish brushed metal handles are used throughout the piece making sure it is simple to use. Boori White Sleigh Urbane 2 Piece Set with Deluxe Purotex Mattress At Boori, they combine classic heritage with contemporary trends to create nursery furniture to treasure for years to come. Their Deluxe Purotex®? Pocket Spring Cot Bed Mattress is designed to provide the baby with a comfortable and supportive night's sleep. It's handmade and features British ECO Ultra Firm Fibre, 230 micro Posturfil pocket springs and hypo-allergenic properties for complete peace of mind whilst your little one sleeps. With its innovative DualTech technology, the mattress has deep Ultra Firm Fibre and an Ecobond insulator pad on one side for newborns as well as a side offering individual pocket springs for toddlers. This helps promote the perfect posture for your child as they grow. With an open cell structure, the firm fibre works with the pocket springs by moulding to the contours of the body. This provides support and allows for increased airflow. As well as a removable Purotex®? Moisture Management cover, the mattress features an internal 'wipe-clean' cover to protect the mattress core. Fabrics that have been treated with Purotex®? contain microcapsules that are filled with natural probiotics. These provide a natural remedy against common allergens. Thanks to friction, when your baby lays on the mattress, the microcapsules burst open and absorb humidity to reduce moisture. These probiotics start to multiply and clean up the allergens. Will this Mattress Fit Your Cot Bed? This mattress is not suitable for some older models of Boori Cot beds. Working with medium to large sections, place the brush into the root area and direct the heat from your dryer at the barrel. Boori White Oasis Oval Cot with Purotex Oval Mattress Transform your nursery into an oasis of calm with the innovative oval cot. Pushing the boundaries of traditional cot design, the Oasis Oval Cot is expertly crafted from sustainable solid wood into a beautifully soft rounded shape. Smooth spindles span the circumference of this round cot, allowing for increased airflow and a more comfortable night's sleep for baby. These dainty spindles coupled with the unique shape offer optimum visibility, especially when placed in the parents' bedroom, making the Oasis Oval Cot an ideal alternative to traditional bedside sleepers during those early stages. Lockable castors, and the fact it can be manoeuvred through standard door frames, mean easy and safe mobility, so when the time comes your Oasis Oval Cot can be moved into the nursery where it will become a stunning centrepiece to treasure for years to come. Lasting you well beyond the newborn stage, the Oasis Oval Cot can also be transformed into a toddler bed and finally a cosy sofa. Whilst the baby sleeps peacefully, you too can rest easy knowing your beautiful cot is crafted with sustainable FSC-certified timber and a nursery-friendly paint finish. The Deluxe Purotex® Pocket Spring Cot Bed Mattress is designed to provide baby with a comfortable and supportive night's sleep. It's handmade and features British ECO Ultra Firm Fibre, 230 micro Posturfil pocket springs and hypo-allergenic properties for complete peace of mind whilst your little one sleeps. With its innovative DualTech technology, the mattress has deep Ultra Firm Fibre and an Ecobond insulator pad on one side for newborns as well as a side offering individual pocket springs for toddlers. This helps promote the perfect posture for your child as they grow. With an open cell structure, the firm fibre works with the pocket springs by moulding to the contours of the body. This provides support and allows for increased airflow. As well as a removable Purotex® Moisture Management cover, the mattress features an internal 'wipe-clean' cover to protect the mattress core. Fabrics that have been treated with Purotex® contain microcapsules that are filled with natural probiotics. These provide a natural remedy against common allergens. Thanks to friction, when your baby lays on the mattress, the microcapsules burst open and absorb humidity to reduce moisture. These probiotics start to multiply and clean up the allergens. Will this Mattress Fit Your Cot Bed? This mattress is not suitable for some older models of Boori Cot beds. Please check the suitability sticker on the base of your cot bed as once opened, returns are not accepted.Wipe clean only.

Yves Saint Laurent LHomme Eau de Parfum 60ml A woody scent that is at once sensual and vibrant, for the sophisticated man. A perfect balance between unrefined and precious, ultra-masculine and elegance, off-the-shelf and luxury. YSLs LHomme is a fragrance for the urban and charismatic 21st century male. Exuding charisma, L'Homme Eau de Parfum is a tribute to redefined masculinity and modern elegance. SCENT The tension between the warmth of woody base notes of cedarwood and oakwood, and the sour zestiness of orange makes for a long-lasting fragrance that is both sensual and vibrant. Top notes: bergamot, lemon essence, orange sour essence Heart notes: geranium essence, lavandin heart Base notes: cedarwood essence, vetiver, oakwood infusion, musk essence BOTTLE The warm bourbon coloured fragrance is housed in a pure glass bottle, capped with the classic YSL LHomme hexagon in silver for a rugged finish. A picture of sophistication for the LHomme connoisseur. APPLICATION Apply fragrance to clean, dry skin. For added intensity, apply to your pulse points and / or hot spots (wrist, inner elbow and lower neck). Here the heat of your body will allow the fragrance to reveal its full trail. Max shine and nourishment, max hair goals.Good to know:Sulphate free | Gluten free | Vegan friendly . How to use: 1. Masterclass Red Cast Aluminium 2.5L Casserole Dish Forget what you know about bulky casserole pots. With the Cast Aluminium collection, MasterClass shows that strong is beautiful and that ‘heavy duty’ doesn’t have to mean ‘heavyweight’. This collection brings three spring-soaked new shades to MasterClass’ best-selling Cast Aluminium cookware. It’s just as robust and lightweight as ever, but with a soft, mindful palette that draws from lush floral landscapes. Be inspired by nature, and choose a colour that suits your kitchen and your mood. Or treat a floral-loving friend - all pieces come gift boxed and ready to delight. Enjoy the best of both worlds. This 2.5 litre casserole dish is made of Cast Aluminium, a material that’s tough like cast iron, but is significantly lighter and easier to handle. And because aluminium is such a great heat conductor, food cooks quickly and evenly, both in the oven and on the hob. (It’s safe for all heat sources, including induction.) The aluminium core is tough enough. But MasterClass has added two layers of its superior non-stick coating, to really bring the goods when it comes to durability. The coating is scratch proof and so effective as a non-stick that you can cook using little to no oil. All your favourite stews, roasts and casseroles just got that little bit healthier! A patina layer will build up on the bakeware through use and continue to advance the performance. It makes clean-up a cinch too. Simply rinse this Cast Aluminium casserole dish with lid in warm water or pop in the dishwasher for good-as-new results.Dishwasher safe. 100% Aluminium.

Tepro Black Garden Keansburg 3 Burner Gas BBQ With Turbo Zone The Keansburg 3 Burner Gas BBQ has a sleek black powder coated finish with contrasting stainless steel trim.  Constructed from SPCC steel, a commercial quality cold rolled steel, the Keansburg 3 boasts three gas burners with push and turn piezo ignition and a large enamelled cast iron cooking surface with a warming rack. With the Keansburg 3 BBQ you don't have to store bulky fuel or wait an age for charcoal to heat up and reach the desired state before starting to cook, the gas provides almost instant heat. A cupboard under the cooking chamber provides neat storage for a gas cylinder up to 11kg in size. Mounted on four swivel casters, two of which are lockable for stability, this large barbecue can easily be manoeuvred. With three continuously adjustable gas burners, one of which is a POWERZONE burner for high temperature searing, this is a versatile outdoor cooking station. Alternatively, lower the temperature and close the hood for more gentle, slower cooking of larger pieces of meat. A built-in thermometer allows you to monitor the temperature in the cooking chamber. The enamelled cast iron cooking surface has a circular centre which lifts out and can be replaced with various optional inserts, known as Tepro's Grid-in-Grid system. The options, available separately, include a cast iron cooking grid, frying pan, wok, pastry inlay, Dutch oven or poultry roaster and even a pizza stone allowing you to fry, sear, roast, make soups, stews, casseroles, vegetable and Asian dishes, bake bread, pizzas, pastries. The working height is a comfortable 85cm. Under the cooking chamber is a cupboard with room to store a gas cylinder up to 11kg in size. Two side shelves provide useful storage and can be folded down when not in use for space saving storage. Mounted on four swivel casters, with two lockable for stability, this large BBQ can be manoeuvred with ease. The Keansburg 3 offers flexibility to cook in many different ways and create a huge variety of food to impress friends and neighbours. The enamel coating on the grill racks and a removable grease tray speed up cleaning so you can spend more time enjoying the company of your guests. This BBQ comes complete with a hose and regulator. Two 3.2kW stainless steel burners and a 4.5kW POWERZONE burner with push and turn piezo ignition. 62 x 43cm enamelled cast iron cooking surface compatible with Tepro's Grid-in-Grid system and an enamelled warming rack. Sleek black powder coated SPCC with contrasting stainless steel trim and hood handle. Trolley with storage cupboard with space for up to an 11kg gas cylinder mounted on four casters, two of which are lockable and two folding side shelves. Dimensions (cm): W136 x D63 x 114.
